data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Chifeng, Nei Mongol, China to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chifeng, Nei Mongol, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Chifeng.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Chifeng, Nei Mongol, China to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Chifeng unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Tatar, Khakass people.
Father, you desire the people in the county of Chifeng who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Chifeng, Nei Mongol, China. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Chifeng, Nei Mongol, China to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

location.name: Chifeng
location.people_groups_list: Mongol, Khamnigan, Saman, Mongol, Khalka, Yugur, Saragh, Evenki
